title: Social Media-Based Social Leadership Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone operation skills and ownership of social media accounts
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, aiming to strengthen social competencies of corporate managers/leaders

learning_goals: Learners can perform wiki/blog writing activities for collaborative knowledge building on social media platforms with an 80% or higher participation rate
Learners complete three or more instances of critical thinking-based opinion presentations in social media-based discussion activities
Learners can improve final outputs by utilizing a peer feedback system (comments/sharing features) for project-based assessment

resources: Mobile-optimized social media tools (blog/wiki) within LMS
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
